entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Alex, how can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'm calling about an order I received yesterday. The bike I ordered is damaged.
I'm so sorry to hear that! Could you please provide your order number so I can look into this for you?
Thank you. I see the order here. Could you describe the damage?
Well, the **cracked frame** is the biggest problem, but also the **wobbly wheel** makes it completely unusable. It looks like **shipping damage** to me, the box was pretty beat up when it arrived.
I understand. I sincerely apologize for the condition your bike arrived in. That's definitely not the VeloFit experience we want you to have. We'll take care of this immediately.
To rectify this situation, I’m going to process a full refund for the bike right away. You don't need to worry about sending the damaged bike back.
We will also provide a **free label** if you prefer to return the bike to us. Just let me know.
Really? That’s great! A full refund is perfect. I don't think I need to return the bike. The refund is plenty.

Excellent. The refund has been processed and should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience this **shipping damage** has caused, and that you received the bike with the **cracked frame** and **wobbly wheel**.
Wow, thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate the quick resolution and the **free label** offer even though I don't need it. That was easy!
You're very welcome! We value your business at VeloFit. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a great day, and thanks for calling VeloFit!
